meanings.definition: A type of pastry or bread roll.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious ruffin for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells various types of ruffins.
meanings.sent3: The ruffin looked so tempting, I couldn't resist buying one.
meanings.sent4: The warm ruffin was a fluffy cloud of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked ruffin filled the room.

meanings.sent1: The ruffin at the party was causing trouble.
meanings.sent2: Be careful around that ruffin, they can be unpredictable.
meanings.sent3: Despite his gruff exterior, he was a lovable ruffin.
meanings.sent4: She was a ruffin in a world of refined individuals.
meanings.sent5: The neighborhood ruffin always had a mischievous twinkle in his eye.

meanings.definition: To act in a rough or disorderly manner.
meanings.sent1: Please don't ruffin up the furniture.
meanings.sent2: The children tend to ruffin around when they play.
meanings.sent3: He decided to ruffin up his appearance for the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The storm ruffined the calm surface of the lake.
meanings.sent5: The wind ruffined her hair into a wild tangle.
